description: Hybrid black poplar LZ02125 North Bank: fell; Lime LZ02149 Education: fell; London plane LZ02338 Gorilla Kingdom: prune out section of small rubbing branch to suitable growth point to prevent further damage; Eucalyptus LZ02339 Gorilla Kingdom: crown reduce west stem to 5m to remove the loner and taller branches above 5m.  Shorten remaining lateral limbs by approximately 2m.  Reduce remaining crown to previous, most recent reduction points.  London plane LZ02381 Amphitheatre: reduce limb to the south east by 3m and reduce upright central leader by 2m; London plane LZ02436 Lion Terraces: crown reduce to previous, most recent reduction points and remove any branches affected by Massaria; Hybrid black poplar LZ02456 Squirrel Monkeys: crown reduce to previous, most recent reduction points; Hybrid black poplar LZ02457 Squirrel Monkeys: crown reduce to previous, most recent reduction points; Hybrid black poplar LZ02458 Squirrel Monkeys: crown reduce to previous, most recent reduction points; London plane LZ03684 Aquarium: prune small rubbing limb over offsite footpath back to first growth point, remove hanging branch, prune back crown to provide 2m clearance from building to the north.
